name: StarsOne
description: You’ll see an unexplored world full of dangers, mysteries and adventures. You will explore randomly generated planets, develop industry, conduct trade, plant colonies, explore outer space.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2.4 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
